The claim states that changes to DACA du: s administration were "because of the pandemic," but the expert's verdict clarifies that Trump's efforts to undo or restrict DACA were not tied to the pandemic.
The expert: s verdict also highlights that DACA benefits people who have been in the United States for many years, not those arriving during the pandemic, further refuting the claim's assertion.
